title: Generate a Bill of Lading (BOL)
description: A shipment is ready to be picked up by a carrier. The shipping clerk must generate the legal Bill of Lading document.

tasks.description: Select the shipment that is ready for pickup.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the shipment record in the TMS.

tasks.description: Verify all details, including addresses, piece count, weight, and freight class.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms all data required for the BOL is accurate.

tasks.description: Generate the BOL document in the standard format.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully generates a printable, legally compliant BOL document.
